name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 3 (Release), Mianyang, Sichuan. Shop owners in Western Lengdu gathered to demand rent. It is understood that in 2018, the developer colluded with the municipal government to make false propaganda, claiming that the project had government support, high investment, high returns, 20-year lease and management, and the first 5-year rent of more than 170,000 yuan could be returned to offset the purchase price for promotion, and the investment could be recovered in 10 years, luring a large number of middle-aged and elderly people to buy shops in Western Lengdu, Longmen, Mianyang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 3, Changsha, Hunan. Villagers in Guanshaling protested in the middle of the night and shouted in unison, "Down with corrupt officials, remove village cadres"
November 3, Xianyang, Shaanxi. The Chenguang No. 1 building was left unfinished, and the owners held banners in a march.
November 1, Sichuan. Migrant workers have been owed wages for three years and have not yet received them. Workers held banners in front of the court to demand their wages.
November 3, Hubei. Qianrui Haoting building owed construction workers wages, and workers defended their rights and demanded wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 25, Beijing. BMW's first 5S store in the world, Xingdebao, closed down, and employees and car owners gathered at the door to demand wages and defend their rights.
October 26, Zhanjiang, Guangdong. Villagers in Xitou Village, Mo Village, Longtou Town, Potou District protested against the village head for allowing the laboratory near the village to discharge sewage into the village.
October 29, Beijing. The owners of a project of China Green Development Luneng protested against frequent water and power outages. There was even a power outage of more than 24 hours in the summer of 2024.
October 29, Zhuhai, Guangdong. Workers of Enjie Photovoltaic Company held banners to demand wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 29, Loudi, Hunan. Workers of the photovoltaic power generation project in the mine in Lengshuijiang City demanded their wages.
October 30, Zhengzhou, Henan. Owners of Haojinyuan in Xinmi City protested against the unfinished project.
October 30, Anyang, Henan. Owners of Ginkgo Plaza demanded the handover of their houses.
October 30, Heze, Shandong. Owners of Tianrun Mansion Yuefu protested that they still had no direct water supply and floor heating after years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A businessman tells the story of his experience of being "distant sea fishing"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 2, in Jingdezhen, Jiangxi, a 14-year-old boy covered a girl's mouth and nose in an elevator and carried her away. It was reported online that the boy was released after writing a letter of guarantee because he was a minor. On November 4, the local police responded: The boy involved has been punished, and the parents of both parties have not yet reached an agreement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a netizen revealed that the Peking University Library owed wages, and the average daily working hours exceeded 12 hours, all year round. It has been 3 months without a penny.
Netizens said: I can't imagine that China is the largest socialist country on earth, and the people are the masters of the country, and this kind of thing would happen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 3, a blogger posted a video saying: What do you think of when you mention Zhengzhou, Henan?
This triggered "malicious memories" among netizens
